data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Phan, Quoc Toan, Kompier, Tom, Karube, Haruki, Hayashi, Fumio (2018): A synopsis of the Euphaeidae (Odonata: Zygoptera) of Vietnam, with descriptions of two new species of Euphaea. Zootaxa 4375 (2): 151-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4375.2.1|200 occurrences
